topicTitle: i didn't know where to put this

posts.postText: Hey. i was banned from the server, the terrorist one. i am (BG)Anglegirl and i would wish to be unbanned. i killed a guy twice while he was afk for 2 rounds. im so sorry if i am unbanned i will never rdm again.
You put this in the wrong section of the forums.
where do i put it ? and duh thats what i said in the title
